item.title: Don't Try
item.description:
The moment you resist, you go against the natural flow of existence. When you resist anything or anyone in its true nature, you unknowingly build a cage within the realm of existence and this is where you’ve already lost the game.

Freedom lies in the absence of resistance, and the mantra should be to ’not invest in resistance’. Solitude is found in experiencing the raw, being in tune with it rather than resisting its natural flow.

item.title: The Observer is the Observed
item.description:
People view the world through their own perceptions, and so they see nothing but themselves. There exists one single universal consciousness, within which our minds create our own little distinct identities to perceive the universe on our own terms.

When you become observant of your self and the totality of life, you begin to see how everything is connected and that none of us are truly different. It’s all part of one system.

item.title: I know that I know nothing
item.description:
We unknowingly reject things due to the lack of our understanding of the broader reality they exist within. We must acknowledge the fact that we don’t even know the knowns, let alone the unknowns.
